description: Universe simulation model for the Starsheet game
name: starsheet

scripts.all: yarn && yarn fix && yarn check:types && yarn test && echo `echo 8J+OiSBEaWQgYWxs | base64 -d`
scripts.check:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern .; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
scripts.check:types: tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBUeXBlcyBhcmUgZ29vZCEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
scripts.confgen: npx confgen@latest @app react vite vitest typescript yarn eslint prettier githubActions start
scripts.fix:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern . --fix; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
